short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks your comments anywhere on the web: GitHub or Azure DevOps!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A prototype browser extension for improving online comments such as code reviews on Github or Azure DevOps. The idea is that the extension would make suggestions before you post a comment. This gives developers a chance to think about their phrasing and reword the comment.
